runs.comm: short of length outside off, turned to midwicket
beaten by the away movement outside off
played out to point
angling away, 126 kph, hit between point and cover
flails at one leaving him outside off, 126.5 kph, beaten

and he's got his first wicket in international cricket, does it so many times for Uttar Pradesh, some move away, one comes in, like this one, and Jamshed has no answer, he has been set up by all those outswingers, big gap between bat and pad
fine start for Dinda, length ball angling in, and then moving away a tad, defended
pitched up, moving away, Shehzad gets forward and drives it past cover
some shot for no run, solid punch off the back foot, cover is in the way
lots of width, but he cannot drive it past point, Raina in the way again
good length outside off, could have been put away, but the off side infield is packed with men, and despite Raina's dive at point missing the ball, Jadeja covers it at backward point
finally one bursts through the off side circle, and Hafeez is away with a boundary first ball
moves across to a length ball, 130.1 kph, on off, worked away to midwicket

huge appeal for caught behind, and it is eventually upheld, outswinger to the right hander, luring him into the drive, Dhoni snaps it up, will have to check replays to see if there was an edge, yes, clear sound of  a nick as ball passes bat
inswinger this time from wide of the crease, but too much on it, and Dhoni has to dive down the leg side
tight line outside off now, left alone
terrific line from Bhuvneshwar, bounce too from a good length, and it straightens as well, too much for the right-hander
he is getting good lift, this time Umar Akmal lets it go

Bhuvneshwar Kumar, where have you been all this while, ripper, absolute, complete ripper, this has swung in a mile from wide of the crease, pitched, and seamed in as well, and hit the top of middle stump, bull's eye, with a white ball, Umar Akmal pushed a straight bat at it, it was all he could have done
pitched up for the drive, left alone
whoa, away shape, too much, Dhoni grabs it in front of first slip
Dinda sticking outside off stump, good length, generating bounce, being left alone
consistent away movement from that good length outside off, not played at
shot! captain Hafeez fighting with a whip off the back foot, that sends the short of a length ball wristily from off stump through midwicket
played out to point from the crease
length ball worked past short leg
lovely outswinger, Hafeez came down the track trying to counter the movement, but it reared and moved away from a length to beat him
this one was angled in now, not all that much, he takes a step out and lets it go, Ponting fashion
good length this time, into off and middle, worked through square leg for two
just too good at the moment, Hafeez smiles as well, angled in a bit, draws the batsman into a forward push, and then then straightens just enough to beat the outside edge by an inch or two
the big inswinger now, outstanding control, hit on the pad, but it was doing too much
typical Ishant, straight and back of a length outside off, bouncing, left alone
played towards backward point for a single off the back foot
good carry, from a fullish length too, height worked for Irfan, working now for Ishant, left alone
worked down to fine leg
that was headed for off stump, 136.7kph good length, stabbed away half-forward
ends like he started, straight, lifting one outside off, allowed to go past
good length around off stump, putting some effort into it, defended
away shape but it started too far outside off, short of a length
that straightened outside off stump, but Hafeez was in control, driving with an open face to deep point
sharp bounce for a delivery bowled at 126 kph, just short of a length, left alone
they will play him out, gentle straightening one outside off stump, allowed to go past
reaches out now for a widish length ball, in the air for a while, away to deep point
half-hearted dab wide of third man, who saves the boundary with a tumbling stop
squared him up, good length, angled in, and then bouncing and swerving away, beaten completely
width, and cut away neatly to deep point
guided to deep point for a single
sharp away movement after pitching outside off stump, no chance of getting behind that, no chance of finding the edge as well, too good a delivery
and now he brings it in, but for once, he is really unlucky Ishant, as an inside edge denies him and produces four runs
moving in with that strange action, good length, worked square to leg
slow, loopy, full, squeezed out through cover
he bowls like delivering legbreak, the ball swings in full, played back to him
now this one was a legcutter from the back of the hand, defended
boundary, Malik has had enough of Kohli, he reaches out to a loopy legcutter, and puts it away past point
hit to long on for a single
harmless looking darter, punched out to deep midwicket
gets something on the attempted sweep, and jogs a single as the ball rolls in front of short fine
down the track, Yuvraj fires it in to the pads, chipped away to deep square
he is down to play the reverse paddle even before the ball is bowled, does not get hold of it, away to short third
punched from the crease, but finds midwicket, and is annoyed at that
slogged, safely, comfortably to the deep midwicket boundary, which is vacant
shortish, skiddy, coming in, and worked to deep square
jags back in from a good length, punched to long on
similar type of delivery, worked through midwicket, it is in the gap, and they are back for the second
excellent stroke, Hafeez opening up now, goes down on a knee, Kohli has been bringing it back in, and Hafeez uses that angle to slog it flat to the deep square rope
steered to short third man
tossed up delivery patted back down the track
adjusted well in the end, came down the pitch, Yuvraj dragged back the length, he opens the face to hit it to the sweeper
that had almost hit middle stump, Malik's bat came down for the cut at the very lats instant, away to sweeper cover
the reverse paddle tried again, not much bat on it, Jadeja runs, slides and stops it at short third man
part-timers hurting India now, Yuvraj bowling it flat and shortish, Malik opens up, and pounds it into the crowd beyond deep midwicket
well played, allows it to come on, and runs it to short third very late, from close to off
dragging it shortish first ball, punched down to long on
runs it to short third man, and Ishant Sharma lets it through his hands
he is targetting deep midwicket, goes back to a flat one and pulls it in the air over midwicket
Dhoni goes up immediately after taking the ball down the leg side, not called a wide, not given as well, could have brushed the glove on its way to Dhoni, not sure
worked out to midwicket
lofted on the bounce to wide long off
good effort from Raina at extra cover, that was drilled in the air to his right, but his leap saved the boundary as he got a hand to the ball
short, but pulled straight to deep square
flat slog sweep, some bounces to deep midwicket, trickles out of his hands
keeps pulling and pulling, not that short but flat, and he immediately rocks back and swivels to hit it over midwicket
this is short alright, this is very ordinary from Yuvraj, bashed easily over wide long on, and out of sight
stays back to a pitched up delivery and punches it to long on
lifted over midwicket once more, productive area this, man in the deep gets to it
swept to short fine leg
that has been thumped straight down the ground, a couple of paces out, gets under the ball, and powers it over the sightscreen
fuller, defended from the crease
squeezed out to point

and again, this is getting over fast, nothing unrestrained about Mohammad Hafeez today, unlike the World Twenty20 game, he jumps out, and pings the long off boundary with a flat six, also brings up his 50
run out chance, Raina stops the punch at extra cover, turns around and throws at the non-striker, misses, and the batsman is also in
what a shot, not all that short from Ishant, got quickly onto Hafeez too, but he swivelled sharply to tonk it high over midwicket, bounces just in front

another run out chance missed, kohli failing to pick up the ball cleanly at mid off, Hafeez ran into Ishant in his followthrough, and had no chance to make it had Kohli thrown in time, Hafeez pats Ishant on the back of the leg in good humour
cut away to third man
shot, lovely timing from the Pakistan captain, Ishant pitches it up, and Hafeez lifts it sweetly over mid off
punches a lifting short of a length ball to the bowler
they are going for almost everything now, length ball around off, Malik swings hard at it, gets it over the bowler, diving stop down the ground
he's pulled well, short ball, rising high, he gets on top of it and swivels vigorously to hit it over midwicket
one beats the outside edge after a long time, late away movement, luring him into the drive
Dinda bangs it in short, Malik swings at it, top edge goes screaming a few bounces into the fine leg rope
pitched up, driven, straight to extra cover
short and wide outside off stump, and Hafeez has upper-cut it straight to third man
beaten, pitched up outside off stump, past the outside edge on the push
beaten once again, Ishant getting it to move away from just outside off stump, Malik driving quite loosely

top catch from Jadeja, whatever he might be, but he is a world-class fielder, short and wide working for Ishant again, for some reason Malik has started playing wild shots, gets in the air to upper cut, Jadeja runs back from point to take it as it comes down at his head, but the height has saved Malik, he was in the air as he played that stroke, and the ball was at the top of his head, third umpire deems it to a no-ball for height
Ishant beats Kamran now with one that is angled in, he pushes outside the line, and the ball goes past leg stump
and next ball Kamran has a blind charge and heave, only to get beaten again
played out to midwicket
full toss squeezed out to point, throw is wide at the non-striker's
driven to sweeper cover
low full toss slogged to long on, and that is fifty for Shoaib Malik
banged in short and wide outside off, not called a no-ball for height this time

what's happening to Pakistan, Kamran has made room and stabbed a full delivery straight to Ishant at third man, the fast bowler takes it and throws it into the ground, shouting out stuff that would make Virat Kohli proud
Dinda finds the blockhole outside off stump, squeezed out behind point, Jadeja pounces on the ball
he steps out down the track, Jadeja fires it in, hit on the pads, they take the leg bye
low full toss, Afridi gives it the Afridi heave, does not get hold of it, comes back even as the throw comes in from deep midwicket
heave, miss, ball rolls off Afridi to the off side, Dhoni after it, single taken
Shoaib Malik has done it for Pakistan, he;s wound up and deposited a length delivery from outside off just in front of the sightscreen
